properties.name: Calcutt
properties.description:
Thames Flood Zone 3 and EA flood warning area.
Residential farm buildings and 14 traveller pitches

properties.name: Fairview Fields
properties.description: Fluvial Flooding from the Thames and Keys. Retention of furrows essential. Ditch running behind the houses takes outfall from Calcutt Street.

properties.name: High St. North
properties.description:
Fluvial flooding around Wharf cottages from Churn
Fluvial flooding from Thames.
Surface Water problems arising from being on outfall route to Thames from gas Lane Area.

properties.name: Calcutt Street & Spital Lane
properties.description:
Limited road drainage.
Some houses on north side below street level.
1 Spital lane vulnerable to run off from school car park
Levels changed at back of school to take water south behind houses to the Keys

properties.name: High St. South / Pauls Croft
properties.description:
Back of Pauls Croft and Waylands are in EA flood warning area for River Keys
Clearance of ditches between houses and river Keys essential

properties.name: North Wall
properties.description:
Fluvial Flooding from Thames
Surface water concerns – drains from school fields and areas south go through North Wall to Thames outfall.

properties.name: Gas Lane
properties.description:
Surface water flooding common.
On route to Thames outfall.
Infill building drainage not fit for purpose.
Engineering solution required

properties.name: Reeds / Westmill Lane
properties.description:
Surface Water runoff from Common Hill through Home Ground via Reeds to Westmill Lane.
Top of Westmill lane in EA Flood Warning Area for River Thames.

properties.name: Leisure Centre
properties.description:
Surface water run-off from Common Hill.
Two Victorian attenuation chambers across old railway track at top of field. One rebuilt 2010.
Water runs down ditch at side of Stones Lane, under the road, through a ditch into drainage in Westmill lane.

properties.name: Common Hill
properties.description:
South side – Surface Water from Chelworth which yields a capacity of 219 litres per second at a velocity of 3.108 metres per second when the pipe is full.
North side- foul sewerage discharge affected by surface water from hill.

properties.name: Fiddle
properties.description:
Surface water from Chelworth.
Poor levels result in foul sewerage discharge

properties.name: Bournelake
properties.description:
Flood Zone for River Thames. Surface Water Flooding
16 Travellers pitches
